meanings.definition: A group or bunch of people or things.
meanings.sent1: The gajos of colorful balloons filled the sky.
meanings.sent2: The market was bustling with a gajos of shoppers.
meanings.sent3: At the party, a gajos of kids played musical chairs.
meanings.sent4: The forest was a gajos of different trees, standing tall and proud.
meanings.sent5: The gajos of stars in the night sky was a breathtaking sight.

meanings.definition: A group of friends or companions.
meanings.sent1: My close-knit gajos always supports me.
meanings.sent2: We went on a road trip with a fun gajos.
meanings.sent3: The gajos of pals shared a pizza and laughed together.
meanings.sent4: Her friends formed a protective gajos around her.
meanings.sent5: The gajos of friends made the hike enjoyable and memorable.

meanings.definition: A group of men or boys.
meanings.sent1: The gajos of boys played soccer in the park.
meanings.sent2: A gajos of men gathered for a game of poker.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous gajos of boys plotted a prank.
meanings.sent4: The gajos of men cheered loudly at the sports event.
meanings.sent5: The gajos of boys raced each other to the finish line.
